data.title: What is Infor Lawson Security Administration?
data.meta_description: Infor Lawson Security Administration (LSA) tools are installed on the desktop computers of users who administer Lawson users, security, and resources. LSA consists of the following desktop tools: ...
data.text:
Infor Lawson Security Administrator is used by security administrators of standalone Infor Lawson System Foundation (LSF) installations, to perform tasks like adding users and their identities to the system, creating security classes and rules, and assigning them to users.

If your system is not standalone, because you are federated to Infor Landmark (or another system), you must use Infor Security Services to add users.
